name: Mega Studio
description: A massive creative hub with all 13 shop types under one roof. Features rotating exhibitions, artist residencies, and weekly community workshops.

name: Williamsburg Maker Space
description: A premier destination for makers featuring all traditional and digital fabrication tools. Monthly workshops and open studio nights every Thursday.

name: Bushwick Workshop
description: Specializing in woodworking and 3D printing. Features CNC machines and laser cutters. Weekly skill-sharing sessions for members.

name: Greenpoint Fabricators
description: Community-focused fabrication space serving makers of all skill levels. Features a small cafe and regular open house events.

name: DUMBO Creative
description: Small studio space with stunning Manhattan skyline views. Specializes in precision woodworking and digital fabrication.

name: Bed-Stuy Workshop
description: Historic brownstone converted into maker studios. Focuses on supporting local artisans through affordable workspace and mentorship programs.

name: LIC Makerspace
description: Industrial-sized creative space in a converted warehouse. Features large-scale equipment and monthly maker markets.

name: Crown Heights Studio
description: Community maker center offering classes for children and adults. Specializes in traditional craft techniques and modern fabrication.

name: Prospect Heights Workshop
description: European-style workshop focusing on traditional craftsmanship with modern tools. Offers specialized courses in furniture making and digital design.

name: Gowanus Fabrication
description: Specialized digital fabrication studio with professional-grade 3D printers and CNC machines. Offers training and prototyping services.

name: Sunset Park Makers
description: Multicultural maker space serving the diverse Sunset Park community. Features bilingual classes and workshops highlighting traditional crafts.

name: Flatbush Workshop
description: Community maker center with workshop space and tool library. Hosts the annual Flatbush Makers Festival in June.

name: Park Slope Studio
description: Cozy neighborhood studio offering classes for parents and children. Specializes in family-friendly making activities and birthday parties.

name: Red Hook Makers
description: Waterfront maker space with stunning harbor views. Focuses on sustainable making practices and community projects addressing local needs.

name: Williamsburg Micro Studio
description: Micro-studio space designed for emerging makers needing affordable workspace in the heart of Williamsburg. Limited to 10 members at a time.

name: Bushwick Experimental
description: Cutting-edge space for experimental making. Features advanced digital fabrication tools and specialized equipment for unique projects.

name: Brooklyn Paint Collective
description: Specialized studio for traditional and contemporary painting techniques. Features natural north light and professional-grade materials.

name: Print Hub
description: Premier destination for printmaking including screen printing, letterpress, and etching. Offers open studio time and professional printing services.

name: Artisan Print Studio
description: Specializes in fine art printing and painting restoration. Features vintage printing presses and conservation-grade materials.

name: Paint & Sculpt Workshop
description: Waterfront studio specializing in painting and sculpture. Features outdoor workspaces and views of the Manhattan skyline.
